cache-clean-result.help: Enable/disable cache of clean scan results (default = enable).
cache-clean-result.name: cache-clean-result

options.help: Enable cache of clean scan results.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable cache of clean scan results.
options.name: disable

cache-infected-result.help: Enable/disable cache of infected scan results (default = enable).
cache-infected-result.name: cache-infected-result

options.help: Enable cache of infected scan results.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable cache of infected scan results.
options.name: disable

default-db.help: Select the AV database to be used for AV scanning.
default-db.name: default-db

grayware.help: Enable/disable grayware detection when an AntiVirus profile is applied to traffic.
grayware.name: grayware

machine-learning-detection.help: Use machine learning based malware detection.
machine-learning-detection.name: machine-learning-detection

options.help: Enable machine learning based malware detection.
options.name: enable

options.help: Enable machine learning based malware detection for monitoring only.
options.name: monitor

options.help: Disable machine learning based malware detection.
options.name: disable

override-timeout.help: Override the large file scan timeout value in seconds (30 - 3600). Zero is the default value and is used to disable this command. When disabled, the daemon adjusts the large file scan timeout based on the file size.
override-timeout.name: override-timeout

use-extreme-db.help: Enable/disable the use of Extreme AVDB.
use-extreme-db.name: use-extreme-db
